titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on B-Bromo-B-nitrostyrene.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/13/2000--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2004, the temporary suspension of duty on a specified chemical.
